definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: It is the dog drives the opossum up in an apricot tree.
sentences.chinese: 是狗將白鼻心追上了杏子樹。

sentences.english: Mother bought many apricots, but most of them were sour.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽買回好多杏子，可惜大部分是酸的。

sentences.english: Apricots, fresh or dried, are high in beta-carotene.
sentences.chinese: 杏子，新鮮或乾燥的，富含貝它胡蘿蔔素。

sentences.english: Peel apricots with a vegetable peeler, then halve and pit.
sentences.chinese: 用蔬菜去皮機給杏子去皮，然後一切兩半並去核。

sentences.english: A light Aloe &Apricot infused conditioner to repair the hair without any heaviness or greasiness.
sentences.chinese: 蘆薈和杏子用以修護頭髮，令頭髮輕盈及油光不再。

sentences.english: Almonds are a member of the peach family.
sentences.chinese: 杏子其實是桃子家族的一員。

definition: blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
